name: Aztec Tower
description: Aztec Tower is a VR bow & arrow game about defending the temple of your people against the spanish conquistadors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive or other VR Headset supporting SteamVR needed
